Attributes.description: Continues building fluency, accuracy and proficiency at an autonomous level in spoken and written communication. Emphasis on culturally contextualized grammar structures and vocabulary, critical reading and discussion of a variety of texts. Aligned with CEFR level B2 objectives.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: ITAL 302. (Or successful completion of CEFR level B1.)
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 1, Days: Mon Wed, Start Time: 11:00, End Time: 12:30, Building: Buchanan, Room: D314
